block.p: HOUSE OF BLUES ENTERTAINMENT INC., -- Hollywood, will open nine new amphitheaters and clubs in Dallas and seven other United States cities by next year, expanding the number of its outlets by about a third.
ROYAL AHOLD N.V., -- the Netherlands, said it was opening 300 stores this year, including 50 outlets in the United States, and plans a similar expansion in 2001 to lift sales and earnings.
